Title: Explore GitHub
Description: Explore is your guide to finding your next project, catching up with what’s trending, and connecting with the GitHub community.

Title: GitHub Maintainer Scholarships are now available for GitHub Universe
Description: Apply for a maintainer scholarship—and join us at GitHub Universe 2019 in San Francisco, November 13-14.

Title: Getting Started with GitHub Actions in Visual Studio | Visual Studio Blog
Description: GitHub Actions uses a clean new syntax for expressing workflows based on YAML scripts—so you can edit, reuse, share, and fork them like code. By including actions in your repositories, others would be able to easily test and build projects using the same actions used on the original projects.

Title: Avoiding ASP.Net Core Configuration Pitfalls With Array Values
Description: ASP.NET Core continues to improve on the legacy of the .NET Framework. Our team is impressed with its performance and excited about future possibilities, but change is seldom a smooth transition. In this post, I’ll explain a pitfall you may run into using the newest configuration model in .NET Core and options to mitigate the issue.
